Index.luckyDrawDesc: Import a list for random draws, presented with 3D sphere animations.

LuckyDraw.title: Lucky Draw Tool
LuckyDraw.description: A cool lucky draw tool that supports importing a list of names and presenting the draw process in a 3D sphere animation.
LuckyDraw.inputPlaceholder: Enter participant names, one per line...
LuckyDraw.minParticipants: Number of participants must be greater than winners
LuckyDraw.step1: Enter or import a list of participants (supports Excel and TXT file import)
LuckyDraw.step3: Click the [Start Draw] button or press the space key to start the draw
LuckyDraw.step4: View the results, export the winner list or draw again
LuckyDraw.featureImportDesc: Support manual input, Excel spreadsheet import, and TXT text import
LuckyDraw.featureAnimationDesc: Participants are displayed in a 3D sphere, creating an exciting draw process
LuckyDraw.featureRandomizeDesc: Uses high-quality random algorithms to ensure fair results
LuckyDraw.featureExportDesc: Support exporting the list of winners for further processing and record keeping
LuckyDraw.luckyDrawNote: Note: Adjust settings to customize the drawing experience
LuckyDraw.appIntro: This is a feature-rich lucky draw system for events, meetings, or celebrations.
LuckyDraw.appFeatures: Supports customizing participant lists, setting prize names and winner counts, with 3D animations and sound effects to enhance the experience.
LuckyDraw.tipPreTest: Before formal events, it's recommended to import participant lists and run tests
LuckyDraw.tipPrizeOrder: You can draw prizes in order from lower to higher levels
LuckyDraw.tipFullScreen: Full screen mode offers better effects, suitable for large screens or projectors
LuckyDraw.tipPerformance: In weak network environments, turn off sound effects to improve performance
LuckyDraw.clickToClose: Click anywhere to close this guide
LuckyDraw.clickBottomRightButton: Click the button at the bottom right
LuckyDraw.toOpenParticipantPanel: to open the participant management panel
LuckyDraw.supportFileImport: Support batch import from Excel, CSV or TXT files
LuckyDraw.toGenerateRandomList: button to generate a random participant list
LuckyDraw.setPrizeName: Set the prize name (e.g. "First Prize", "Grand Prize", etc.)
LuckyDraw.setWinnerCount: Set the number of winners (limited by the number of participants)
LuckyDraw.adjustDrawSpeedAndDuration: Adjust the drawing speed and auto-draw duration
LuckyDraw.clickCenterButton: Click the center button at the bottom
LuckyDraw.toStopAndShowResults: to stop drawing and display results
LuckyDraw.canUseKeyboard: You can also use the Space key or Enter key to start/stop drawing
LuckyDraw.resultsDisplayedAfterDraw: Winners list will be displayed after draw completion
LuckyDraw.animationAndSoundEffects: Animations and sound effects will play during the draw
LuckyDraw.statusBarInfo: Status bar at the bottom left shows current status and loaded participants
LuckyDraw.resetConfirmMessage: After resetting, all winners will be restored to the participant list and the winner records will be cleared. Are you sure you want to continue?
LuckyDraw.supportedFileFormats: Supports Excel, CSV and TXT formats
LuckyDraw.welcomeMessage: Click the "Manage Participants" button to start adding participants, or generate sample data to experience the lottery feature
LuckyDraw.noParticipantsMessage: No participants, please import list or add manually
LuckyDraw.removeWinnersFromPool: Remove winners from pool after drawing
LuckyDraw.removeWinnersNote: When checked, winners will not participate in subsequent draws
LuckyDraw.confirmResetWinners: Are you sure you want to clear all winner records? This action cannot be undone.
LuckyDraw.drawResultsWillShowHere: Draw results will be displayed here after drawing starts

Ball.title: 3D Sphere Draw
Ball.description: Immersive 3D sphere draw experience with 1500 participants randomly distributed on rotating sphere surface
Ball.dragDropFile: Drag file here or click to select
Ball.performanceWarning: Performance tip: More than 1000 participants may affect frame rate
Ball.webglNotSupported: Your browser does not support WebGL, unable to display 3D effects
Ball.browserUpgrade: Please upgrade your browser for the best experience
Ball.renderingError: 3D rendering error, please refresh and try again
Ball.memoryWarning: Insufficient memory, suggest reducing participant count
Ball.confirmResetMessage: Are you sure you want to reset? This will clear all current data.
Ball.noValidParticipants: No valid participants found in file
Ball.importFailed: Import failed, please check file format
Ball.welcomeMessage: Click the "Manage Participants" button to start adding participants, or generate sample data to experience the lottery feature
Ball.noParticipantsMessage: No participants, please import list or add manually
Ball.removeWinnersFromPool: Remove winners from pool after drawing
Ball.removeWinnersNote: When checked, winners will not participate in subsequent draws
Ball.confirmResetWinners: Are you sure you want to clear all winner records? This action cannot be undone.
Ball.name: Name
Ball.drawResultsWillShowHere: Draw results will be displayed here after drawing starts

Ball.setWinnerCount: Set the number of winners (limited by the number of participants)
